title: Registry Configuration Schema
description: Schema for defining registries and their sources used by the CLI tool.

$schema.description: Optional schema reference for IDEs and editors to provide auto-completion and validation.

registry.description: List of registry entries containing repository and source definitions.

name.description: The unique name of the registry (e.g., 'ui').

url.description: The URL of the GitHub repository.

dirname.description: Destination directory path in the local project where files from this registry will be copied.

sources.description: List of source directories within the repository.

name.description: The name of this particular source (e.g., 'components', 'hooks').

url.description: Relative path in the repository to this source directory (e.g., 'src/shared/components').
